channel.title: About OSPO++ on OSPO++
channel.description: Recent content in About OSPO++ on OSPO++

item.title: About OSPO++
item.description: OSPO++ is a global network and a community of collaborative open source program offices (OSPOs) focused on supporting the core mission objectives of universities, governments, and civic institutions.

item.title: Contact Us
item.description: The quickest and best way to reach us is to email us at info@innersourcecommons.org. If you are already part of our Slack group just send any of the team members a direct message.

item.title: OSPO++ Code of Conduct
item.description: Mailing List Code of Conduct The OSPO++ mailing lists aim to facilitate constructive discussions of challenges and concerns that are particular to Academic Organizations and further the goals of OSPO++.
